document.full_text: top u.s. food distributor sysco corp  reported quarterly results that easily beat analysts' expectations, as demand for its products rose even as it increased prices, sending its shares up as much as 11 percent to a year-high.
document.title: sysco results beat estimates, shares up
lines_and_colors: top u.s. food distributor sysco corp  reported quarterly results that easily beat analysts' expectations, as demand for its products rose even as it increased prices, sending its shares up as much as 11 percent to a year-high.
